alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:49AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Greene and northeastern Craighead Counties through 315 AM CST... At 249 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bono, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Bono, Brookland, Lake Frierson State Park, Herman, Schug, Farrville, Dorothy, Lester, Bethel, Finch, Lorado, Herndon and Goobertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
